title: How popular is Kerry Katona in the UK? - Quora

response.answer_text: She had a brief fling with fame back in the early 2000’s as part of the girl group Atomic Kitten. Bubblegum pop for youngsters. Had a much publicised relationship with fellow Bubblegum pop boyband member who it later transpired was a douchebag. When it hit the papers she was suddenly elevated to’Nice kid such a shame’ status. And she’s been doing the odd media thing ever since

Basically a bit of a nonentity really. She was a member of an indifferent 3rd rate ‘Girl Band’ 20 years ago. Since then she has been better known for her poor choices of life partners and her struggle with various addictions. Not someone you’d want your son to shack up with.
